highlights.title: Emergency Scenario Introduction
highlights.description: Sets the stage for understanding ABO incompatibility.

highlights.title: Signs of Acute Hemolytic Reaction
highlights.description: Identifies critical symptoms like low blood pressure and brown urine.

highlights.title: Mechanism of Reaction Explained
highlights.description: Details the immune response and complement system involvement.

highlights.title: Key Takeaway for Clinicians
highlights.description: Emphasizes immediate actions to take during a transfusion reaction.

highlights.title: Differentiating from Other Reactions
highlights.description: Clarifies differences between ABO mismatch and other reactions.

highlights.title: Conclusion and Call to Action
highlights.description: Encourages viewers to like, subscribe, and learn more.
